sentence: The women endorsed by E-PAC on Tuesday included: Annie Black (Nev.-04) Lori Chavez-DeRemer (Ore.-05) Mayra Flores (Texas-34) Cassy Garcia (Texas-28) Madison Gesiotto Gilbert (Ohio-13) Erin Houchin (Ind.-09) Liz Joy (N.Y.-20) Anna Paulina Luna (Fla.-13) Morgan Ortagus (Tenn.-05) Tanya Contreras Wheeless (Ariz.-04) New "Women to Watch" 2022 E-PAC candidates included: Kalena Bruce (Mo.-04) Jessica De La Cruz (R.I.-02) Regan Deering (Ill.-13) Theresa Gavarone (Ohio-09) Barbara Kirkmeyer (Colo.-08) Jan Kulmann (Colo.-08) Catalina Lauf (Ill.-11) Cassandra Tanner Miller (Ill.-11) Yesli Vega (Va.-07) Sarah Walsh (Mo.-04) "I look forward to supporting these Rising Stars across the finish line in both their primaries and general elections.
author: Charlie McCarthy
title: Stefanik's E-PAC Endorses 10 More GOP Women for House
